alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 11:43PM CST until March 07 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Trempealeau River at Arcadia affecting Trempealeau and Buffalo Counties. For the Trempealeau River...including Arcadia, Dodge...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trempealeau River at Arcadia. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. A few streets are affected by high water, and pumping operations begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 7.99 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of around 8.0 feet around 1 AM Monday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
